argumentText:
ARGUMENT
i j

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | decpmate.p | |- P = ( Poly1 ` R ) |
| 2 |  | decpmate.c | |- C = ( N Mat P ) |
| 3 |  | decpmate.b | |- B = ( Base ` C ) |
| 4 | 2, 3 | #P_decpmatval | |- ( ( M e. B /\ K e. NN0 ) -> ( M decompPMat K ) = ( i e. N , j e. N |-> ( ( coe1 ` ( i M j ) ) ` K ) ) ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_3adant1 | |- ( ( R e. V /\ M e. B /\ K e. NN0 ) -> ( M decompPMat K ) = ( i e. N , j e. N |-> ( ( coe1 ` ( i M j ) ) ` K ) ) ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( ( R e. V /\ M e. B /\ K e. NN0 ) /\ ( I e. N /\ J e. N ) ) -> ( M decompPMat K ) = ( i e. N , j e. N |-> ( ( coe1 ` ( i M j ) ) ` K ) ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_oveq12 | |- ( ( i = I /\ j = J ) -> ( i M j ) = ( I M J ) ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( ( i = I /\ j = J ) -> ( coe1 ` ( i M j ) ) = ( coe1 ` ( I M J ) ) ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_fveq1d | |- ( ( i = I /\ j = J ) -> ( ( coe1 ` ( i M j ) ) ` K ) = ( ( coe1 ` ( I M J ) ) ` K ) ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( ( ( R e. V /\ M e. B /\ K e. NN0 ) /\ ( I e. N /\ J e. N ) ) /\ ( i = I /\ j = J ) ) -> ( ( coe1 ` ( i M j ) ) ` K ) = ( ( coe1 ` ( I M J ) ) ` K ) ) |
| 11 |  | #P_simprl | |- ( ( ( R e. V /\ M e. B /\ K e. NN0 ) /\ ( I e. N /\ J e. N ) ) -> I e. N ) |
| 12 |  | #P_simprr | |- ( ( ( R e. V /\ M e. B /\ K e. NN0 ) /\ ( I e. N /\ J e. N ) ) -> J e. N ) |
| 13 |  | #P_fvex | |- ( ( coe1 ` ( I M J ) ) ` K ) e. _V |
| 14 | 13 | #P_a1i | |- ( ( ( R e. V /\ M e. B /\ K e. NN0 ) /\ ( I e. N /\ J e. N ) ) -> ( ( coe1 ` ( I M J ) ) ` K ) e. _V ) |
| 15 | 6, 10, 11, 12, 14 | #P_ovmpt2d | |- ( ( ( R e. V /\ M e. B /\ K e. NN0 ) /\ ( I e. N /\ J e. N ) ) -> ( I ( M decompPMat K ) J ) = ( ( coe1 ` ( I M J ) ) ` K ) ) |
